summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LiveAlertsPanel Settings Enhancement. All 32 backend API tests passed. Frontend settings panel fully functional with scan interval presets (30s, 1m, 2m, 5m), setup type toggles (rubber_band, breakout, vwap_bounce, squeeze), watchlist editing (add/remove symbols), Save Changes, and Reset to Defaults.
passed_tests: GET /api/live-scanner/config - Returns 200 with scan_interval and enabled_setups
POST /api/live-scanner/config - Updates scan_interval to 30s (aggressive)
POST /api/live-scanner/config - Updates scan_interval to 60s (standard)
POST /api/live-scanner/config - Updates scan_interval to 120s (moderate)
POST /api/live-scanner/config - Updates scan_interval to 300s (conservative)
POST /api/live-scanner/config - Updates enabled_setups list
POST /api/live-scanner/config - Updates both interval and setups together
GET /api/live-scanner/watchlist - Returns 200 with watchlist array
POST /api/live-scanner/watchlist - Sets custom watchlist
POST /api/live-scanner/watchlist - Adds new symbols
POST /api/live-scanner/watchlist - Removes symbols
POST /api/live-scanner/watchlist - Converts symbols to uppercase
Frontend: Settings button (gear icon) visible in LiveAlertsPanel header
Frontend: Settings panel opens when clicking settings button
Frontend: Scan interval presets (30s, 1m, 2m, 5m) are selectable
Frontend: Setup type toggles work (rubber_band, breakout, vwap_bounce, squeeze)
Frontend: Add symbol input adds new symbol to watchlist
Frontend: Remove symbol (X button) removes symbol from watchlist
Frontend: Save Changes button persists settings to backend
Frontend: Reset to Defaults restores original watchlist and settings
Frontend: Footer shows current watchlist size, interval, and setup count
Frontend: Settings panel closes after saving
Backend persists config changes correctly
Backend persists watchlist changes correctly
critical_code_review_comments: SettingsPanel component properly manages local state before saving
Config and watchlist endpoints correctly update BackgroundScannerService
Frontend correctly fetches and displays current config from backend
Reset to Defaults uses hardcoded DEFAULT_SYMBOLS array (15 symbols)
All data-testid attributes present for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: LiveAlertsPanel Settings Enhancement fully tested. Key features: (1) Settings button opens dropdown panel, (2) Scan interval presets: 30s/1m/2m/5m, (3) Setup type toggles: rubber_band/breakout/vwap_bounce/squeeze, (4) Watchlist editing: add/remove symbols, (5) Save Changes persists to backend, (6) Reset to Defaults restores 15 default symbols and 60s interval. All backend endpoints: GET/POST /api/live-scanner/config, GET/POST /api/live-scanner/watchlist working correctly.

frontend_features.footer_stats: Working - shows symbols count, interval, setups count
